title: upgrade openssl version to fix CVE-2023-0286
body:
## Bug Report

TiKV currently use an old version openssl-src `111.20.0+1.1.1o`. The bug [cve-2023-0286](https://www.trellix.com/en-us/about/newsroom/stories/research/cve-2023-0286-the-openssl-who-cried-severity-high.html) was fixed in `1.1.1t`.

So let's upgrade the openssl version.

comments_data.body:
Remove non-lts version
